body_html:
@ebrevdo @aselle - Without passing tensor array name as arguments also , I am getting the same error . Tensor array name was more of a debugging mode for me , to understand which Tensor array is causing the error . AlreadyExistsError: Resource _tensor_arrays/while/TensorArray_6/N10tensorflow11TensorArrayE

The tensorflow version was 0.9

I upgraded it to 0.11 . Now the error has changed .
InvalidArgumentError: TensorArray while/TensorArray_6_3: Could not read from TensorArray index 0 because it has not yet been written to.
How come this error is happening , if we are properly writing it in each iteration. Please have a look .

body:
@ebrevdo @aselle - Without passing tensor array name as arguments also , I am getting the same error . Tensor array name was more of a debugging mode for me , to understand which Tensor array is causing the error . AlreadyExistsError: Resource _tensor_arrays/while/TensorArray_6/N10tensorflow11TensorArrayE

The tensorflow version was 0.9 

I upgraded it to 0.11 . Now the error has changed . 
InvalidArgumentError: TensorArray while/TensorArray_6_3: Could not read from TensorArray index 0 because it has not yet been written to.
How come this error is happening , if we are properly writing it in each iteration. Please have a look .
